name: Tiny Troopers 2
description: Tiny Troopers are back and better than ever! Decked out in new uniforms and sporting the latest in military hardware, the troopers are just itching to get back into the fight! Test your mettle and lead your troopers to victory in four thrilling special operations!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: 1.4GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 Storage: 500 MB available space
